actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 101-651, by Mr. Hall (OH).

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 3950. During the further consideration of H.R. 3950 under the five-minute rule, debate on the following amendments is limited as follows: an amendment to title VI by Mr. Conte, 20 minutes; an amendment to title XI by Mr. Conte, 60 minutes and a substitute thereto by Mr. Huckaby, 60 minutes; an amendment to title XIV by Mr. Stenholm, 20 minutes and a substitute thereto by Mr. DeFazio, 20 minutes; the amendments en bloc to title XVII by Mr. Frenzel, 40 minutes. Protected amendments will be debated for 10 minutes each. Measure will be read by title. Specified amendments are in order.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 139.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for the further consideration of the bill (H.R. 3950) the "Food and Agricultural Resources Act of 1990".

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the further consideration of H.R. 3950 (agricultural programs extension).

titles.title: Providing for the further consideration of the bill (H.R. 3950) the "Food and Agricultural Resources Act of 1990".
